mapper.select: SELECT mem.userid, userpw, username, enabled, regdate, updatedate, address, phone, email, auth FROM tbl_member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_member_auth auth ON mem.userid = auth.userid WHERE mem.userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (userid, userpw, username, address, phone, email) values (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{userName}, #{addr}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_member where userid = #{userid}
mapper.update: update tbl_member set userpw = #{userpw}, username = #{userName}, address = #{addr}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, updatedate = sysdate where userid = #{userid}
